mapper.insert: INSERT into schedule values ( #{schedule_id}, #{s_category_id}, #{s_emp_id}, #{s_dept_id}, #{schedule_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedule_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{end_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{startTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR});
